What type of game is PlayDapp?: What is Ookeenga Game?
PlayDapp is Other game: <p>Ookeenga is a 3D gaming project built on the Binance Smart Chain. With breathtaking graphics, appealing world-building, and addictive gameplay, Ookeenga is ready to create a uniquely immersive play-own-earn experience.</p>

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Ookeenga unique?
PlayDapp is Other game: <p>The gameplay of Ookeenga is a combination of 3 genres that are common in the gaming community: Real-time Strategy, Collectible Card, and Tower Defense.</p><p>Players will be placed with troops/active skills to attack the opponent on a battlefield.</p><p>The match ends when: The player destroys the opponent's main house.</p><p>Within 3 minutes, the match will automatically terminate the game and calculate the score based on the % remaining health of the Main-tower and Sub-towers. Whoever destroys the opponent's Main Tower shall immediately win the game. If time's up and the Main Tower still remains, which side destroys more towers will become the winner.</p><p>During the battle, there will be a mana bar (an Oom bar) which shows the amount of mana the player has in his/her hand. The player uses the Oom bar to deploy troops/active skills. Each type of piece or spell will have a different amount of mana cost depending on its strength.</p>

Players can control the heroes they purchased and their troops to battle the enemies.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span style="background-color:transparent;color:hsl(0,0%,30%);">- Weapon NFTs: In OKG, besides strategy and army, weapons also significantly impact a player's strength. When the heroes are hybridized or bought, they will have their default weapons corresponding with their class. Users can upgrade the weapons through manufacturing, trading on the market, or receiving prizes from PVP and game events. Weapons will enhance the attributes of the heroes and be beneficial effects for troops when combating.</span></p><p><span style="background-color:transparent;color:hsl(0,0%,30%);">- Land NFTs: Each land owned by the player is an NFT item, and has a position in the OKG map, which provides players with a&nbsp;passive income flow of resources (tokens, in-game materials…).</span><br><span style="background-color:transparent;color:hsl(0,0%,30%);">+ A Village can be built on the land,&nbsp;designed &amp; decorated with items purchased from the marketplace. These decorations can be purely visual, or can also boost the farm’s maximum output.</span><br><span style="background-color:transparent;color:hsl(0,0%,30%);">+ Players&nbsp;can also earn tokens and resources by conquering the mines, forests, and fields on the OKG world.</span><br><span style="background-color:transparent;color:hsl(0,0%,30%);">+ OKG world&nbsp;is an open world for its citizens.</span></p>

Discerning players can buy and customize their own NFT backed Private Lounges with different lounge types offering different options for customization, including space for NFT art, the ability to change and modify furniture and other details, a choice of Game Stations to battle it out with friends, and even ad spaces, allowing lounge owners to share in advertising revenue.

Future updates will also introduce game portals, through which players can access other metaverse titles without needing to leave the comfort of their lounge.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: How many Game Lounge NFT are there?
PlayDapp is Other game: NFT collectors are all unique, but there’s one thing that they all share: a pride in their collections. With tGame Lounge, collectors can proudly display their prized NFTs on the wall of their lounge, just like they would with real art in their actual houses. Different lounges have different numbers of NFT Displays included. The larger and rarer the lounge, the more NFT Displays that come with the lounge, and if you need more space to show off all your awesome NFTs, you’ll have to head to the marketplace and purchase more display space with $GLT. What type of game is PlayDapp?: What is Walken Game?
PlayDapp is Other game:
Walken is a play & exercise to earn mobile app built by a team with over 50 million
app store downloads and $10 million in annual revenue.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Walken unique?
PlayDapp is Other game:
While inspired by Tamagotchi and Pokemon Go, the Walken app's user interface and experience has been engineered to appeal to young and old alike. Their easy to understand interface guides users to easily grasp the basic concepts, so that as they advance in earning and play, users can expose more advanced functionality when they are comfortbale. 

Their early testing revealed, that it was important for us to layer the exposure to functionality little by little rather than all at once. Walken uses the movement detection capabilities of standard smartphones and wearable devices to capture the step counts of users. They also utilize sophisticated algorithms and tools provided by to prevent cheating.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What is Undra Game?
PlayDapp is Other game: Undra is the flagship game from Studio Decent. It's an MMO that operates using Web3 technologies, and will mix real-time stategic play with 2D platformer graphics.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Undra unique?
PlayDapp is Other game:
Undra exists at the intersection between Web3 and traditional gaming. There is already a huge range of games here, in varying stages of development, many that are already released and thriving. 
Undra is starting out with a clear distinction between players and owners. Players are those who participate in non-financial ways. This will look more like a typical free-to-play business model (though with the benefits of ownable rewards).
The two worlds will cross heavily, and most Owners will also be Players. This approach allows us to focus on creating a setting and game systems where financial play is optional, and where we can gradually introduce mainstream gamers into the benefits of community ownership and governance.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What is Ready Games Game?
PlayDapp is Other game: The Ready Games Network (RGN) is building mobile-first Web3 tools and technologies to democratize access to game creation.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Ready Games unique?
PlayDapp is Other game:
Ready advances the notion that building an ecosystem of compatible games will, overall, benefit all the participants in the ecosystem:

- For Developers: More revenue and better retention and acquisition through collaboration
+ Players are more likely to purchase in-game content knowing that NFTs can transport across titles, increasing ARPPU for the dev teams. 
+ Players are more likely to try new games, knowing their profile, player identity, friends list, and inventory can be accessed across participating games, reducing “CPIs” for dev teams.

- For Players:  Investing in a universal player profile rewards the effort, as the same profile appears game to game, enabling longer-term rewards and achievements across the ecosystem. 

- For Creators:
+ Simple to use authoring tools, a quick path to selling created items, across a marketplace that goes from game to game
+ When a creator can bind an object to a property right through an NFT, this dramatically raises the perceived value of the item- and increases the probability that creators can be fairly remunerated for their efforts

What type of game is PlayDapp?: How does Rage Effect work?

What type of game is PlayDapp?: Rage Effect Gameplay Overview
PlayDapp is Other game: <p>The game has an objective-based gameplay and offers six different game modes for players to choose from.</p><p>One of the game modes is Team Deathmatch where two teams compete to fulfill objectives such as eliminating enemy players. What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Generative Dungeon unique?

This allows for endless possibilities and creates a unique experience for each player.</p><p>Community-Driven: Generative Dungeon is a community-driven game, meaning that the players have a say in the direction of the game. The developers take feedback and suggestions from the community to improve the game and create new features.</p><p>Embedded Anywhere: The NFTs are playable directly on OpenSea and many other marketplaces or can be embedded on any website, allowing for easy accessibility for players.</p><p>Generative Avatars: The game also features Generative Avatars, which are 2x PFP and Playable NFTs that bring players into a new realm of the Dungeonverse. These avatars can enter into the original Dungeons so players can play with their own characters.</p><p>3D Dungeon Experience: The upcoming release of Generative Quests will immerse players in a 3D Dungeon Experience, further expanding the game's unique features.</p>

What type of game is PlayDapp?: How does Generative Dungeon work?
PlayDapp is Other game: <p>Generative Dungeon is a community-driven RPG collection of NFTs that is fully playable and customizable. Each NFT is playable directly on OpenSea or any other marketplace, and can be embedded anywhere. Players can own and customize their own Dungeons and create metaverse games that can be played by players worldwide or exclusively within their own communities.</p><p>The gameplay is based on dungeon crawling, where players explore randomly generated dungeons, fight monsters, and collect treasures. Each dungeon is unique and can be customized by the Dungeon owner, who can add or remove rooms, traps, and monsters. Players can also earn rewards by completing quests and challenges within the dungeon.</p><p>In addition, Generative Dungeon features Generative Avatars, a 2x PFP and Playable NFT that brings players into a Battle Royale Dungeon game. Avatars can also enter into the original Dungeons, allowing players to play with their own characters.</p>

What type of game is PlayDapp?: Generative Dungeon Gameplay Overview
PlayDapp is Other game: <p>Generative Dungeon is a community-driven RPG collection with fully customizable and playable NFTs. Each NFT is a unique character or dungeon that can be played directly on OpenSea or embedded on any website.</p><p>Players can customize their characters by choosing their weapons, armor, and other attributes, making each character unique. They can also create their own dungeons or play in the dungeons created by other players.</p><p>The game also features Generative Avatars, which are 2x PFP and Playable NFTs that can be used to play a Battle Royale Dungeon game with friends. Avatars can also enter into the original Dungeons, allowing players to use their own characters.</p><p>With the upcoming release of Generative Quests, players will be immersed in a 3D Dungeon Experience.</p><p>The game is backed by the Ethereum blockchain and connects to a NodeJS-based backend. Players can earn rewards by playing the game, and NFTs can be traded on various marketplaces. The community-driven aspect of the game allows for endless possibilities and creativity, making it a unique and exciting gaming experience.</p>

What type of game is PlayDapp?: How to make money in Generative Dungeon?

By contributing to the community and building a reputation as a skilled player or creator, you may be able to attract more buyers for your NFTs or earn money through collaborations and partnerships.</p><p>It's worth noting that the value of NFTs and in-game currencies can be volatile and subject to market fluctuations, so there are no guarantees of making money through Generative Dungeon or any other NFT game. What type of game is PlayDapp?: What is Arsenal Game?
PlayDapp is Other game: <p><span style="background-color:rgb(255,255,255);color:hsl(0, 0%, 30%);">Arsenal is a 3D First Person Shooter multi-player game developed by Fabwelt for the Fabwelt Gaming Ecosystem and Metaverse. It has a “Counter-Strike” look and feel and it’s fully integrated with blockchain technology. It utilizes in-game NFTs as assets, collectibles and utilities. Pay to Play and Play to Earn is integrated in such a way that attracts everyday players, as well as professional players around the world to get incentives and fun.&nbsp;</span><br>&nbsp;</p>

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Arsenal unique?
PlayDapp is Other game: <p><span style="color:hsl(0, 0%, 30%);">Arsenal has different game modes like Free for All, Deathmatch, Capture the Flag etc. Various maps are included along with the other features to maximize gameplay and fun!</span><br><span style="color:hsl(0, 0%, 30%);">Compared to the FPS games that most players are familiar with, Arsenal offers some different mechanics in its gameplay. In-game NFTs such as freezing opponents by using the "Freeze" NFT utility or becoming immortal for a short period of time by using the "God" NFT utility adds twists to the gameplay, making things much more interesting for players who are bored of standard FPS mechanics. That being said, the core mechanics of the genre are still the same; the main goal in Arsenal is to outgun the opponent and get kills to win the match.&nbsp;</span><br><span style="color:hsl(0, 0%, 30%);">To begin playing the game, players must stake 1000 WELT. After staking is completed, players can choose to participate in three different game modes such as Free Play, Automated Tournaments, and Fabwelt Tournaments.</span><br><span style="color:hsl(0, 0%, 30%);">Free Play mode gives players the freedom of creating new game lobbies or joining existing lobbies. This is the normal match mode where players can practice and hone their skills. Players can earn points, or WELT tokens, by getting kills, headshots, killstreaks, and winning the match.</span><br><span style="color:hsl(0, 0%, 30%);">Automated Tournaments are tournaments that are available 24/7 and organized automatically by the system. These tournaments may happen in randomly selected maps and game modes. This automated system is set up in a way that there is always a tournament available for players to participate in. In order to get into the tournament, players must pay a gas fee in the form of WELT tokens. The prize pool of this tournament is the total amount of paying players minus 10% for P2E and staking wallet. The winner player can claim the entire prize pool.</span><br><span style="color:hsl(0, 0%, 30%);">Fabwelt Tournaments are special tournaments that will be organized by Fabwelt once every month. Again, players must pay a gas fee in form of WELT tokens to participate in this tournament type. In addition to the gas fee, depending on the tournament style, players may need to stake WELT as well to participate in Fabwelt Tournaments. The prize pool of Fabwelt Tournaments is the total amount of paying players minus 10% for P2E and staking wallet plus Fabwelt special bonus. Again, the winner player can claim the entire prize pool by himself.</span></p>

All NFTs become player assets and can be bought and sold on both internal and external marketplaces.</p>

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What is Atmos Game?
PlayDapp is Other game: Atmos is an expansive, play-and-own (P&O) universe dedicated to metaverse-native sports. It has a rich land and resource-based economy, an emergent crafting system, and an omnidirectional flight interface.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Atmos unique?
PlayDapp is Other game: Players have a variety of ways to interact with Atmos. Taking on the role of Exo pilots, players compete in races, mine OREs from Atmos' rich mineral deposits, and fabricate new pieces of gear. New game modes, expansions and additional features will be released regularly as we incrementally build and improve the Atmos ecosystem.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: How many Atmos NFT are there?
PlayDapp is Other game:
Almost everything on Atmos is ownable. Players own their Exos, gear, land, OREs, and shares of the game itself.
Core Ownable Assets:
+ Exos are omni-directional flight suits. Each Exo is a composable NFT containing multiple pieces of equipment.
Gear is a sub-component of equipment. Each piece of gear is a distinct NFT. 
+ Land is broken into NFT plots that players can purchase, lease, and mine for OREs. 
+ OREs are fungible resources used to fabricate gear.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: Who are the developers of Atmos?
PlayDapp is Other game: Built by a team of technologists, entrepreneurs, community builders, design experts, and gaming fanatics, Kevin Beauregard is Atmos Labs’ Founder and CEO.

Adanimals is a multi-mini-game Play-to-Earn ecosystem that uses virtual pet NFTs for gameplay identity.
Adanimals World is a P2E hypercasual metaverse gaming playground. It’s inspired by Tamagotchi, NeoPets and Pokemon Go by creating multiple mobile-friendly minigames to participate and earn rewards while growing together with their virtual pet.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Adanimals unique?
PlayDapp is Other game:
Your bond with your Adanimal is everything! Grow it by playing mini-games, training and communicating with it through the chatbot, staking, and participating in special missions.
Each bonding level increases the rarity of your Adanimal and possibilities for additional growth and rewards.
Only achieving the ultimate bond of true love will qualify your Adanimal for the ultimate experiences and opportunities.

What type of game is PlayDapp?: How many Adanimals NFT are there?

Genesis NFTs: The Genesis colony live an orderly life and respect the rules of Adanimals World. The three tribes are organized and take turns when participating in specific activities such as: tournaments, breeding seasons, and Discord contests. 
Almighty NFTs: The Almighty colony is free to roam Adanimals World without any restrictions. Each Almighty NFT is a distinct design with its own unique characteristics. Almighty NFTs have special powers and features that allow them to participate in Adanimals World activities at any time they want, including: tournaments, breeding seasons, and Discord contests.

PlayDapp is Other game: <p>Wildcard is a blockchain-based collectible card game built on the Polygon network. The game leverages non-fungible tokens (NFTs) to offer players unique and rare card designs that can be traded, bought, or sold in a secure and transparent manner.&nbsp;<br>Wildcard features various game modes, including PvE campaigns and PvP matches, allowing players to build their decks and compete against each other in a virtual arena. The game's economy is powered by its native token, WILD, which enables players to purchase new cards, participate in tournaments, and earn rewards.&nbsp;<br>With its engaging gameplay and innovative use of blockchain technology, Wildcard is set to become a popular NFT game on the Polygon network.</p>

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Wildcard unique?

What type of game is PlayDapp?: What makes Mushro Legends  unique?
PlayDapp is Other game: <p>The P2E game hit the crypto market last year. There are still a lot of P2E games out there in the making or already launched. Why is this happening?</p><p><strong>Lifespan, Reality, and Limitations of the P2E Games</strong></p><p>Due to the tremendous success of Axie Infinity, P2E NFT game becomes the mainstream of the crypto tokens and tens of game tokens launches every day on the market. Axie infinity was the main source of income in Southeast Asia countries including the Philippines last year. Some warned that it's just a rug pull and will be forgotten very soon but it's still going on and even the large traditional game companies are joining the market.</p><p>But most of the P2E games show the same cycle, causing losses to lots of crypto investors.</p><p><strong>P2E game Pattern</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>The goal of the P2E game is to make money by playing the game as a goal, but almost all P2E games that have come out to date are just gamification of the Defi.</p><p>The game itself is not enjoyable or funny at all. It just takes your time and is boring. You are playing it only because you can make some profits. The quality of the games is very primitive - some of them are not even playable.</p><p><strong>What did we do differently in Mushro Legends then?</strong></p><p>A game is enjoyable only when you compete with others and feel a sense of accomplishment and you get ahead of others.</p><p>We studied famous game models in the market and designed the gameplay in an enjoyable and fun way in the long run. We have full control over the GDOGE token, and this will ensure the token price keeps going up.</p><p>Lastly, the Mushro Legends can be playable with in-app purchases on Apple Store and Google Play Store which is open to those who don't know cryptocurrency or NFTs. When the arrow is dropped on top of a valid target, the spell happens and the cost is spent.<br>IF the card is a unit and requires a target (for example the keywords Ranged) and you don’t have room for the unit on the board, drag the target arrow first to a target, then select a unit to sacrifice to leave room for your new unit. The card effect only happens after you’ve chosen which unit to sacrifice, until then you can cancel the spell by right clicking or doing an invalid action like clicking somewhere else other than the unit to sacrifice.<br>Combat - select a target to attack with your unit When attacking a leader with a unit If the unit deals damage to a leader, the leader loses life according to the unit’s attack. When attacking a unit with a unit, the attacked unit loses health according to attacking units attack. What type of game is PlayDapp?: How does ArcPlay work?
